org.hkijena.jipipe.extensions.imageviewer.plugins.maskdrawer

Class MaskDrawerTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.jipipe.extensions.imageviewer.plugins.ImageViewerPanelPlugin
      • org.hkijena.jipipe.extensions.imageviewer.plugins.maskdrawer.MaskDrawerTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageViewerPanelCanvasTool, JIPipeWorkbenchAccess
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EllipseMaskDrawerTool, FloodFillMaskDrawerTool, MouseMaskDrawerTool, PencilMaskDrawerTool, PolygonMaskDrawerTool, RectangleMaskDrawerTool

    public abstract class MaskDrawerTool
extends ImageViewerPanelPlugin
implements ImageViewerPanelCanvasTool
    Super class for any tool that can be used in MaskDrawerPlugin
